The chosen ones shots came down on Phobias ship like a hailstorm. he 
could hear each one hitting the remaining shields.

"This has got to stop." he raised the decimator rifle, put it on it's 
highest setting and fired in the chosen ones direction. he opened the 
comm again "I can't turn over a fellow Predacon but I can turn this 
over to you." the blast from the rifle could do an immense amount of 
damage, hopefully they wouldn't realize that he'd need time to 
recharge.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> The Chosen Ones took hits and continued to fire, there were more of 
them and
> 7 times as many bullets!...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Sunday, September 03, 2000 1:07 AM
> Subject: Re: FIGHT! ....again.
> 
> 
> >
> > ::KitKat/GoldenEye::
> >
> > GoldenEye took a hit in the chest and fell over on the ground.
> > KitKat grabbed GoldenEye and looked at her.  The wound was near 
the
> > spark, but missed it by an inch.  She picked up GoldenEye and took
> > her to the entrance of the cave.  She put her just inside the 
door of
> > the base, out of harms way.  "Someone take her to the CR.  She's 
hit."
> > GoldenEye sat slumped over near the entrance with bullet holes in 
her
> > sides, chest, legs and wings.  She was leaking badly.
> >
> > KitKat ran back outside and continued to spray the Maximals with 
gun
> > fire.  She took a few more hits in the shoulders and hip.  She
> > groaned in pain, but continued to stand her ground.  This was her
> > base and she wasn't giving up. She was leaking badly, but she 
didn't
> > care.  She wsan't going to let a slagging maximal drive her from 
her
> > own base.
> >
